Object.Table: SELECT Id,Name FROM sysobjects WHERE (xtype = 'U') AND (status >= 0) ORDER BY name
Object.View: SELECT Id,Name FROM sysobjects WHERE (xtype = 'V') AND (status >= 0) ORDER BY name
Object.StoredProcedure: SELECT Id,Name FROM sysobjects WHERE (xtype = 'P') AND (status >= 0) ORDER BY name

Property.Table: SELECT sc.name AS Name, syscomments.text as [Default], (st.name +'('+(CASE WHEN sc.length >= 0 THEN CONVERT(varchar,sc.length) ELSE 'MAX' END)+')') AS Type, case when exists(select * from sysindexes as idx inner join sysobjects as t2 on t2.xtype='PK' inner join sysindexkeys as sid on sid.id = idx.id and sid.indid=idx.indid and t2.name = idx.name where sid.colid = sc.colid and idx.id = sc.id) then 1 else 0 end AS IsKey, (select value from ::fn_listextendedproperty (default,'user','dbo','table','{NAME}','column',default) as e where e.objname=sc.name AND e.name='MS_Description') AS Note FROM syscolumns sc inner join sysobjects as t on t.id = sc.id INNER JOIN systypes st ON sc.xtype = st.xtype left join sysobjects on sysobjects.id = sc.cdefault and sysobjects.type='D' left join syscomments on syscomments.id = sysobjects.id WHERE (sc.id = {ID}) AND (st.name not in ('sysname','BuildItemIDKind')) ORDER BY sc.colorder
Property.StoredProcedure: SELECT sc.name AS Name, (st.name +'('+CONVERT(varchar,sc.length)+')') AS Type, sc.isoutparam AS IsKey,'' AS Note,''as [Default] FROM syscolumns sc INNER JOIN systypes st ON sc.xtype = st.xtype WHERE (sc.id = {ID}) AND (st.name not in ('sysname','BuildItemIDKind')) ORDER BY sc.colorder
